description: AztecOO provides an object-oriented interface the the well-known Aztec Krylov-space iterative solver library. Uses the Epetra linear algebra services to define vector and operator objects. To access the AztecOO package, please refer to the packages directory within the main Trilinos GitHub repository.
name: Trilinos/AztecOO
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
